name: Ortlieb Bikepacking Fork Pack
description:
Add this fork pack to your set up when you need a little more storage space. The fabric and roll top are waterproof and ideal for long tours and adventures where rain is inevitable.PU-coated nylon is completely waterproof.IP64 waterproof rating stays dry in rainy weather.Internal stiffener adds stability.Quick-Lock S adapter is compatible with fork eyelets or 30-42mm diameter tubes.Spring loaded locking mechanism for quick attachment and removal.

        Sustainability






.cls-1,.cls-3{fill:none;}.cls-2{clip-path:url(#clip-path);}.cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:2.28px;}.cls-4{fill:#333;}
